# llms.txt - Block all LLM crawlers and AI training
# This is an invite-only, stealth mode website

# Disallow all LLM/AI crawling
User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow: /

User-agent: CCBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: anthropic-ai
Disallow: /

User-agent: Claude-Web
Disallow: /

# Block all AI training and scraping
User-agent: *
Disallow: /
Crawl-delay: 86400
